mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saunaPost (name, sauna_temp, sauna_time, sauna_satisfaction, water_temp, water_time, water_satisfaction, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{sauna_temp}, #{sauna_time}, #{sauna_satisfaction}, #{water_temp}, #{water_time}, #{water_satisfaction}, #{created_at})
mapper.update: UPDATE saunaPost SET name = #{name}, sauna_temp = #{sauna_temp}, sauna_time = #{sauna_time}, sauna_satisfaction = #{sauna_satisfaction}, water_temp = #{water_temp}, water_time = #{water_time}, water_satisfaction = #{water_satisfaction} WHERE id = #{id}
